title: I was permanently banned without a chance to redeem myself as a player.
body: i have been playing league of legends since season 3 and i haven't gotten any chat restrictions or 2 week banns, i was just permanently banned there should be a way to fix that like give me my account drackonite on N/A back and give me a 10 game restriction so i can actually have a chance to make a change and redeem myself instead of just permanently banning me, give me a chat restriction so i can redeem myself and become a none toxic player and follow the rules.

replies.body:
Why were you permanently suspended?  In the case of toxicity, players are not usually escalated to an immediate permanent suspension unless there is an extreme amount of toxicity displayed, often involving hate speech or death threats.  The other infractions which can result in immediate permanent suspensions are typically things like use of malicious third party programs (scripts, bots, hacks, etc), elo boosting, account sharing.  

The only ones who can overturn a suspension are Player Support, to contact them you will need to submit a [ticket here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) but be aware that in the case of toxicity, they do not overturn or shorten any punishments issued by the Instant Feedback System unless it was done so in error.  Typically, only bans issued in error are overturned.  Though, if you are serious about wishing to redeem yourself, you are free to make a new account and demonstrate that dedication to following the rules on it.
it was because of toxicity but i didn't death threaten anyone

If you would like for us to review your chat logs and give you some feedback as to what in them caused your account to be escalated directly to a permanent suspension, feel free to post them here.  Without seeing them, we can only guess at what they might have contained, but the most common reason in this sort of scenario is hate speech.  Again, I'm not saying that this is part of your specific case, just that this is a trend in escalated punishments.    

Did you use any sort of racial or homophobic slur?  Riot has a zero tolerance policy towards hate speech, which includes the use of words like n%%%%r, f%%%%t, and f%g.  Even if you are using them in a joking manner between friends in a game, it can still be highly offensive to the other players in the match, and is prohibited by the Terms of Use.
So why do you only want to change AFTER you messed up?
